content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1640168421745{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”]Thank you to all of our customers for your continued support.

Over the holiday period, support for customers with 24/7 services will continue as usual. Back office services will be offline over public holidays.

We wish you a happy, healthy and peaceful Christmas break.[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”14213″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
